• Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game with procedurally generated worlds and real-time synchronization via MQTT.
  • Features include building, crafting, upgrades, a shop system, teleportation, and cloud save support through Puter integration.
  • Supports both desktop and mobile controls with responsive UI layouts for portrait and landscape orientations.
  • Includes admin/host controls for managing servers, player promotions, and map synchronization.

Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game where players explore procedurally generated worlds, mine resources, and build structures. The game features real-time multiplayer synchronization through MQTT, a comprehensive shop system with upgrades, teleportation mechanics, and cloud save functionality via Puter integration. It supports both desktop and mobile platforms with responsive controls and includes admin/host management tools for server administration.
